message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this valuable product to you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. This is a competitive price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value of the product. However, based on my budget constraints, I am unable to meet your asking price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I still need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to reduce the price to $1080000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to meet your price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1060000. I hope this proposal will be more in line with what you're looking for.

I understand that you're still trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer the product to you for $1040000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. I hope this revised price meets your expectations.

I appreciate your efforts in adjusting your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered your proposal, and I would like to make a counteroffer of $1055000. I hope this figure will be acceptable for us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I'm surprised by your counteroffer, Bob. I'm not willing to go back to the original price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I can offer the product to you for $1030000. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope you'll consider it a fair compromise.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1045000. I hope this figure will be within your range and allow us to finalize this transaction.

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to meet me halfway. I can offer the product to you for $1020000. This is the final offer I'm willing to make. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll need to consider other options.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice. I've reviewed all our previous discussions and decided to make one last counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $1035000 for the product. I hope this figure will be agreeable and allow us to conclude this negotiation.
